program: Master of Arts in Human Kinetics
notes: Disclaimer: In the event of a discrepancy between this course sequence and the official calendars, the calendars take precedence and are considered the authoritative source.
You must enroll in this activity each term until completed.

courses: APA6302 | Qualitative Research Methods in Sport, Physical Activity and Health OR APA6303 | Quantitative Research Methods in Sport, Physical Activity and Health

APA6104 | Selected Topics in Sport, Physical Activity and Health: Sociocultural Studies OR APA6105 | Selected Topics in Sport, Physical Activity and Health: Psychology and Pedagogy OR APA6110 | Selected Topics in Sport, Physical Activity and Health: Management OR APA6111 | Selected Topics in Sport, Physical Activity and Health: Leisure studies
APA6100 | Qualitative Data Analysis in Sport, Physical Activity and Health OR APA6101 | Quantitative Data Analysis in Sport, Physical Activity and Health
